Map030.Event[123].Page[0].list.message[9: "I definitely don't want to delve these nightmarish
Map030.Event[123].Page[0].list.message[1: "I'll stick with you guys for sure!"

"Well, I guess I can manage on my own too, no worries."
"Don't let the dungeon have its way with you. Bye."

Map030.Event[283].Page[1].list.message[3: "I don't know what got into me."

Map030.Event[292].Page[1].list.message[3: "I'm sorry you had to see me that way..."
Map030.Event[292].Page[1].list.message[4: "Thank you for your help. I must repay this one day...
Remind me that I owe you one."
Map030.Event[292].Page[1].list.message[5: "Five is a crowd in these dungeons. Maybe scout ahead in that
party? I'll wait here for a while."
Map030.Event[292].Page[1].list.message[6: "Don't worry. I won't show such weakness anymore."

Map030.Event[293].Page[1].list.message[0: "That was pitiful of me... Have I underestimated the strength

Map030.Event[293].Page[1].list.message[3: "That was pitiful of me... Have I underestimated the strength
Map030.Event[293].Page[1].list.message[5: "I've climbed up from deeper depths before..."
Map030.Event[293].Page[1].list.message[7: "You are not expecting my gratitude, are you?"
Map030.Event[293].Page[1].list.message[8: "Are you asking me to join your party?"
Map030.Event[293].Page[1].list.message[9: "Marching these hallways in such a big party would attract
every little murderous critter from a kilometers radius..."
Map030.Event[293].Page[1].list.message[1: "Instead. I will collect my thoughts here for a moment. Come
back when one of you has perished or fled the horrors."
